data.eml:eml: Psammophilous halacarid mites (Trombidiformes, Halacaridae) from the North Coast of São Paulo State, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pepato, Almir R., Tiago, Cláudio G., Rocha, Carlos E. F. (2011): Psammophilous halacarid mites (Trombidiformes, Halacaridae) from the North Coast of São Paulo State, Brazil. Zootaxa 2823: 47-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205639
